front: Who was the first president of the United States.
What was the agreement signed by British and American leaders that stated the United States of America was a free and independent country.
Who were an English religious sect who hoped to 'purify' the Anglican church of Roman Catholic traces in practice & organization.
In 1807, what act prohibited all foreign trade.
What was the term used to describe World War I at the time of the war.
Who is credited with the invention of the incandescent lightbulb.
